grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 縛する【バクスル】to bind, to restrain
縛帯【バクタイ】bandage, dressing, (webbed) harness (esp. parachute)
呪縛【ジュバク】spell (that restricts one's movements), binding spell
kun reading compounds: 縛る【しばる】to tie, to bind, to fasten, to restrict (freedom), to tie down (with rules, regulations, etc.), to fetter
